SETTINGS.AdvantageDieTypesL: Enter die types to show in roll dialog for advantage/disadvantage. Choose any combination from d4, d6, d8, and d10. For example 'd6,d10'
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupReserved: Attribute group "{key}" is reserved and cannot be used.
SIMPLE.NotifyAttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
SIMPLE.NotifyAttrInvalid: Attribute keys may not contain spaces or periods.
DAGGERHEART.CONFIG.Range.self.name: Self
DAGGERHEART.CONFIG.Range.self.descriptio: Targets the user of the ability

SIMPLE.DeleteGroupContent: Do you wish to delete this group? This will delete the following group and all attributes included in it:
DH.Notify.NoHopeForExperience: Not enough hope to use your experience; the modifier was not applied.
DH.Name: Name
DH.RestComingSoon: Rest functionality will be added in a future update.
DH.MaxTwoWeapons: You can only equip two weapons at a time.
DH.Tier1Achievement: There are no advancements at Tier 1.
DH.Tier2Achievement: At level 2, gain an additional Experience at +2 and gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency.
DH.Tier3Achievement: At level 5, gain an additional Experience at +2 and clear all marks on character traits. Then gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency.
DH.Tier4Achievement: At level 8, gain an additional Experience at +2 and clear all marks on character traits. Then gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency.
DH.AdvancementChooseBelow: Choose two options from the list below and mark them.
DH.AdvancementGainTraits: Gain a +1 bonus to two unmarked character traits and mark them.
DH.AdvancementGainHP: Permanently gain one Hit Point slot.
DH.AdvancementIncreaseExperiences: Permanently gain a +1 bonus to two Experiences.
DH.AdvancementDomainCardLevel4: Choose an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to (up to level 4).
DH.AdvancementDomainCardLevel7: Choose an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to (up to level 7).
DH.AdvancementDomainCardLevel10: Choose an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.
DH.AdvancementEvasion: Permanently gain a +1 bonus to your Evasion.
DH.AdvancementSubclass: Take an upgraded subclass card. Then cross out the multiclass option for this tier.
DH.AdvancementMulticlass: Multiclass: Choose an additional class for your character, then cross out an unused “Take an upgraded subclass card” and the other multiclass option on this sheet.
DH.AdvancementUpdateThresholdsDomain: Update your level and adjust your damage thresholds accordingly. Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.
